summary: Emits synthetic HTTP traffic into the swarm using the configured request template.

config.name: enabled
config.label: Enabled
config.description: Toggle traffic generation without redeploying the worker.

config.name: ratePerSec
config.label: Requests per second
config.description: Nominal request rate the generator should target.

config.name: singleRequest
config.label: Single request
config.description: Emit one request per trigger instead of a continuous stream.

config.name: path
config.label: Request path
config.description: Relative HTTP path used when building generated requests.

config.name: headers
config.label: HTTP headers
config.description: Additional headers appended to generated requests.
